title: Research existing A/B testing tools and AI CRO landscape
notes: Found AgentA/B paper, Evolv AI, VWO Copilot, syntheticusers.com

title: Research agent swarm architectures for web testing
notes: AgentA/B from Amazon uses 1000 LLM agents with personas, browser-use for web automation

title: Research synthetic user simulation approaches
notes: syntheticusers.com, uxia.app - generate personas, simulate clicks/scrolls/forms

title: Define MVP scope and core features
notes: Created ARCHITECTURE.md with full system design

title: Research URL-to-HTML extraction and modification approaches
notes: Built with Playwright - renders JS, extracts HTML/CSS

title: Study AgentA/B paper architecture in depth
notes: Key insight: persona generation + web JSON parsing + action execution loop

title: Evaluate browser-use vs Stagehand as core infrastructure
notes: Chose Stagehand - TypeScript native, self-healing, token caching, Browserbase backed

title: Analyze syntheticusers.com as competitor
notes: They do UX research insights only, not autonomous optimization - our gap

title: Design persona generation system
notes: Built personas.ts with weighted demographics, behaviors, goals, frustrations

title: Build mobile-first Next.js frontend
notes: Created swarm-cro/web with URL input, status screens, results display

title: Build site extractor API endpoint
notes: Built /api/extract with Playwright - extracts HTML, CSS, screenshot, page analysis

title: Integrate Stagehand for browser automation
notes: Deprioritized - using Claude simulation first, real browser later for v2

title: Build variant generation with Claude API
notes: Built /api/variants - generates A/B test hypotheses and changes from page analysis

title: Create agent swarm orchestration system
notes: Built /api/swarm - runs parallel agent simulations with personas across variants

title: Build results analysis and code output
notes: Results UI shows improvement %, stats grid, winning changes

title: Wire up full flow: extract → variants → swarm → results
notes: Full flow working - extract real, variants/swarm simulated for demo

title: Add ANTHROPIC_API_KEY to environment
notes: Needed for real variant gen and swarm - using demo mode for now

title: Deploy to Vercel for persistent access
Add visual preview of optimized page
notes: Built PreviewCompare component with before/after screenshots and CSS code tab
